title: Bandit E-sports LF ADC/Mid
body:
Hey guys, Bandit Hobbs here. Just a quick little post, currently we have a vacant spot for our ADC/Mid role (one of the players can play either role) urgently. Currently we are competing in the Cyber gamer LOL open ladder ($1k prize pool) and need the spot filled ASAP. We we need Plat 1+ ranked players who want to make the transition into the competitive scene of LOL. If you guys are interested please leave a comment or DM my account. All offers will be taken seriously and we are looking for players who show a willing to commit to a team and grind out to be the best they can be. Thank you all and have a good day

Bandit Hobbs, #staylawless
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BanditESC
IGN:Javey Dones

replies.body: Hey currently d4 ADC main here would love to get involved if the position is still open.

Hey I am currently in the process of switching my main role to ADC, I am Challenger (rank 150*)  but peaked Diamond 4 last season. I have been looking for a team to join for some time and would love the opportunity

{{sticker:galio-happy}}
